title: Prepare Your Mac for Python Development
author: Damon M Garn
description: Landing Python on your Macintosh can be tricky. Here's how to install Parallels and Homebrew and stage the optimal development environment.
cntitle: 为 Python 开发准备您的 Mac
cndescription: 在你的Macintosh上安装Python可能有些棘手。以下是如何安装Parallels和Homebrew，并搭建最佳开发环境。
